dim.name: nTemperatureBins
dim.description: The number of temperature bins to be used to span from minTemperature to maxTemperature

dim.name: nSalinityBins
dim.description: The number of salinity bins to be used to span from minSalinity to maxSalinity

dim.name: nTemperatureBinsP1
dim.description: The number of temperature bin edge values to be used to span from minTemperature to maxTemperature

dim.name: nSalinityBinsP1
dim.description: The number of salinity bins edge values to be used to span from minSalinity to maxSalinity

dim.name: nOceanRegionsTmpCensus
dim.description: The number of regions defined within the global ocean (will eventually be moved up and used uniformly across MPAS-O.

nml_option.name: config_AM_waterMassCensus_enable
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member water mass census is called.

nml_option.name: config_AM_waterMassCensus_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often analysis member computation should be performed.

nml_option.name: config_AM_waterMassCensus_output_stream
nml_option.description: Name of the stream the water mass census analysis member should be tied to.

nml_option.name: config_AM_waterMassCensus_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_waterMassCensus_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member output occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_waterMassCensus_minTemperature
nml_option.description: minimum temperature used in water mass census
nml_option.possible_values: any real number smaller than config_AM_waterMassCensus_maxTemperature

nml_option.name: config_AM_waterMassCensus_maxTemperature
nml_option.description: maximum temperature used in water mass census
nml_option.possible_values: any real number greater than config_AM_waterMassCensus_minTemperature

nml_option.name: config_AM_waterMassCensus_minSalinity
nml_option.description: minimum salinity used in water mass census
nml_option.possible_values: any real number smaller than config_AM_waterMassCensus_maxSalinity

nml_option.name: config_AM_waterMassCensus_maxSalinity
nml_option.description: maximum salinity used in water mass census
nml_option.possible_values: any real number greater than config_AM_waterMassCensus_minSalinity

package.name: waterMassCensusAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the water mass census.

var.name: waterMassCensusTemperatureValues
var.description: temperature values defining edges of temperature bins

var.name: waterMassCensusSalinityValues
var.description: salinity values defining edges of temperature bins

var.name: waterMassFractionalDistribution
var.description: fraction of water volume contained within each temperature and salinity bin

var.name: potentialDensityOfTSDiagram
var.description: volume-weighted potential density of each (T,S) bin

var.name: zPositionOfTSDiagram
var.description: volume-weighted vertical position of each (T,S) bin
